channel.title: CSM Module on
channel.description: Recent content in CSM Module on

item.title: Resiliency
item.description:
Starting with CSM 1.12, all deployments will need to use images from quay.io. Please note that from CSM 1.14 (May 2025), upgrading with helm will fail if it attempts to use images from Docker Hub.

CSM for Resiliency can be upgraded as part of the Dell CSI driver upgrade process. The drivers can be upgraded either by a helm chart or by the Dell CSM Operator. Currently, only Helm chart upgrade is supported for CSM for Resiliency.
